    • Usage of the niche metric functions (former 'resniche' package)
  • Changelog

    Reference

    Indicator Species Analysis

    Functions to assess the strength and statistical significance of the relationship between species occurrence/abundance and groups of sites

    wetland

    Wetland vegetation data set

    coverage() plotcoverage()

    Coverage of a set of indicators

    combinespecies()

    Combines species from a community table

    multipatt()

    Multi-level pattern analysis

    indicators() print(<indicators>) plot(<indicators>) summary(<indicators>)

    Indicator analysis for species combinations

    predict(<indicators>)

    Predicts site group from indicators

    pruneindicators()

    Determines the best subset of indicators

    signassoc()

    Statistical significance of species site-group associations

    strassoc()

    Strength of species site-group associations

    summary(<multipatt>)

    Summarizing multi-level pattern analysis

    Niche metric functions

    Functions to measure species niche breadth using resource categories

    birds

    Birds resource use data

    pigeons

    Pigeon seed consumption data

    nicheoverlap() nichedispl()

    Metrics to compare pairs of resource niches

    nichevar() nichecentroid() nichepref()

    Resource niche metrics for a single niche

    plotniche()

    Draws a single resource niche
